Articles.Content:
i get these two vehicles on the surface of the mun and i notice some very odd behavior.

first my framerate drops to beetween 7-14 fps whenever i try to move them.
they randomly decide that they want to lose velocity and suddenly have a max of 2-4ms(even downhilll)
they randomly vault into the air at 15-30ms spinning wildly.

and finnally the only one that actually irritates me is the wheels, randomly they will decide that inverted steering is normal, and normal steering is inverted, im assuming this is what causes my loss of speed. ill just be cruising along then ill start turning left and half way through the turn one of the two front wheels will decide that its going to change its direction, i then have to hit the brakes right click and change steering from normal to inverted on the one wheel. then after awhile it will do it again and i have to change it back.

any help? suggestions? insight?

these are the two offending vehicles.


im begining to think that my dreams of a mun surface base are all for naught.

Haven't built that recently, if you could provide a craft file to test that would be great. I could drop one on Mun and test it. Or one up that, If we have similar mod setup, you could provide a save. It looks like you have USI, KIS, KAS and Vens Stock Part Revamp?

Also a log file of you using the craft could help find the reasons for FPS drop. You know load it up, control the craft and move it around. Then submit that log generated from your play. You could be spamming Null Reference Errors or other in the Alt-F12 debug menu. See below for getting a log file.

Log file could be useful to see any conflict you have.

If thats to much, Probably best to ask in the Konstruction thread on issue.

I  think  I  figured  out  my  wheel  problem, the  probe core s  are  turned 90 degrees, I  moved  my  control  point  and  it  seems  to  have  fixed  it, the  wheel  problem  is  also  probably  why  I  would  lose  velocity, or  randomly  vault  and  flip.

I  do  want  to  figure  out  the  fps  drop  though, ill  put  a  log  file  up  later  tonight.

after having many headaches with all my mods i decided to do a complete uninstall of all mods, then reinstall them all......and now i dont have a wrench icon for konstruction and i cant deploy/retract any of the konstruction parts in the vab/sph or when driving them.

is this like this for everyone that plays this game with mods? you spend more time finding that something is broken and troubleshooting than you actually do playing the game?

heres my log file.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/40e46f849ym5g1i/output_log.txt?dl=0

EDIT: uninstalled 2.2 from ckan and installed 1.2 from spacedock and it works now.

Edited April 25, 2018 by putnamto
